casebody.data:
No. 10-1305. Shelley Evans-Marshall, Petitioner v. Board of Education of the Tipp City Exempted Village School District, et al. 564 U.S. 1038, 131 S. Ct. 3068,

180 L. Ed. 2d 889,

2011 U.S. LEXIS 4909. June 27, 2011.

Petition for writ of cer-tiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Sixth Circuit denied.

Same case below, 624 F.3d 332.
